_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Standards regarding geographic locations, measurements and methods.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: This namespace groups all terms and descriptors that represent standards in the geodesic domain.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: A shape or geometry asspciated with one or more geographic features.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: This *namespace* can be used to group terms defining geographic features associated with a geographic region, shape or geometry.
